title: MacBooks and iMacs could get one of the iPhone's best features - Face ID
description: A new patent revealed that Apple is planning on adding Face ID tech to its MacBook Pros and iMacs.

title: Montana TikTok ban: digital rights groups join the fight against "unconstitutional" bill
